purpose: To curate and provide a comprehensive list of academic papers that explore the integration of knowledge graphs with large language models.
principle: Aggregates and categorizes research papers to facilitate exploration and study of KG-LLM integration.
reusability: Can be used by researchers and practitioners as a reference point for understanding current trends and methodologies in KG-LLM integration.
limitations: Limited to the scope of papers included in the repository; requires manual updates to stay current.
name: KG-LLM-Papers
description: [Paper List] Papers integrating knowledge graphs (KGs) and large language models (LLMs)
highlight: Comprehensive list of research papers focused on integrating knowledge graphs with large language models.
